original_text: Yet if thou warn the wicked, and he turn not from his wickedness, nor from his wicked way, he shall die in his iniquity; but thou hast delivered thy soul.
korean_text: 네가 악인을 깨우치되 그가 그의 악한 마음과 악한 행위에서 돌이키지 아니하면 그는 그의 죄악 중에서 죽으려니와 너는 네 생명을 보존하리라

sentences.original_text: Yet if thou warn the wicked
and he turn not from his wickedness
he shall die in his iniquity
but thou hast delivered thy soul
